snippet: After being rejected by players for use in the world title game, a tennis-like elimination system is used to decide the winner of an important chess tournament.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column on World Chess Federation's adoption of tennis-like elimination system used to decide winner for new biennial competition World Cup.
lead_paragraph: After being rejected by players for use in the world title game, a tennis-like elimination system is used to decide the winner of an important chess tournament.

headline.print_headline: World Cup Adapts a Tennis Format
headline.main: World Cup Adapts a Tennis Format
